description:
What is Sumatra PDF?
Sumatra PDF is a free PDF, eBook (ePub, Mobi), XPS, DjVu, CHM, Comic Book (CBZ and CBR) reader for Windows.

Sumatra PDF is powerful, small, portable and starts up very fast.

Simplicity of the user interface has a high priority.

#### Package Parameters
The following package parameters can be set:

 * `/NoDesktop` - Do not add a desktop icon
 * `/WithFilter` - Install search filter
 * `/WithPreview` - Install shell preview
 * `/Path:C:\path\to\dir` - Change the install directory
 * `/UserLevelInstall` - Do not install system wide, instead create a non-administrative user level install

To pass parameters, use `--params "''"` (e.g. `choco install packageID [other options] --params="'/ITEM:value /ITEM2:value2 /FLAG_BOOLEAN'"`).
To have choco remember parameters on upgrade, be sure to set `choco feature enable -n=useRememberedArgumentsForUpgrades`.

**Please Note**: This is an automatically updated package. If you find it is
out of date by more than a day or two, please contact the maintainer(s) and
let them know the package is no longer updating correctly.
summary: Sumatra PDF is a PDF, ePub, MOBI, CHM, XPS, DjVu, CBZ, CBR reader for Windows
author: Krzysztof Kowalczyk
